reviews.review_msg: Bryan is one of the funniest profs at SFU. He does tend to go on long tangents quite often. He is always able to help. Assignments are done mostly in class so there isn't a lot of work required. The only flaw is that there was unclear guidelines about the final paper. Would take a class with Bryan again!

I think he's great.  He goes off topic and can be monotone, but he knows this and makes jokes about it.  He's hilarious.  This class was relatively easy. We did the assignments in class, so hardly any homework except for reading the textbook.  He's definitely one of my favorite profs at SFU.
